Bowie.James J. Rowley Training Center:
The James J. Rowley Training Center (JJRTC, RTC, or Secret Service Academy) is the law enforcement training center operated by the United States Secret Service just outside Washington, D.C in Laurel, Maryland. It is named for former director James Joseph Rowley.
The site is adjacent to the Henry A. Wallace Beltsville Agricultural Research Center and the Patuxent Wildlife Research Center.
